com.strobertchs.shoppingcartdemo

Class Product

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.strobertchs.shoppingcartdemo.Product

  • public class Product
extends java.lang.Object
    Models a Product item.
    See Also:
    Cart, CartItem

      The Product unit price (cost of a single item of the Product)

        The unique identifier of the product. Based on product_count

    • Constructor Detail

      • Product

        public Product(java.lang.String pName,
               double pUnitPrice)
        Create a new Product instance. 
         Initializes:
 name to parameter pName.
 unitPrice to parameter pUnitPrice.
 Increments product_count by 1.
 productID to String of product_count.
        Parameters:
        pName - the name of the product
        pUnitPrice - the price of the product
